title: Masteries
body:
So I deleted my masteries and wanted to make it better I guess you could say. So now I have Top AD, Top AP, Top AD Tank, Top AP Tank, JG AD, JG AP, JG AD Tank, JG AP Tank, Mid AD, Mid AP,  ADC Crit, ADC AS(Attack Speed) , ADC Caster, Supp, Supp Caster, Supp Burst. 

Idk if Mid should have something like what I have for Top? And i'm not sure if ADC Crit and ADC AS, ADC Caster would be right for ADC mastery pages. Along with the Supp caster and burst

Can someone help me with this? Should I add something else to mid, and what do I need to change for ADC and Supp since my top is the only one I feel like those 4 pages are right but not sure about the rest.

replies.body:
Personally, I only have 7 mastery pages. One for each combination of 18/12 (and a 6/6/18 for specific tank junglers).

I just choose the appropriate page then just switch a couple masteries around. I feel this keeps my pages less cluttered.
See, I wanted to do a page for just top, a page for just mid, jg, adc and supp, but then I remember that theres tanks and ap bursts and different kind of jglers, and other roles..
Since multiple classes can go into each lane, it's really just better to focus on those classes for runes/masteries instead of lanes themselves
